sentences.sentence: Hoping this Christmas will be your merriest ever!
sentences.translation: 愿今年圣诞节是您最快乐的圣诞节。

sentences.sentence: In the New Year. We wish the merriest of Christmas to you and your loved.
sentences.translation: 圣诞节转眼又到，又该迎接新的一年了。

sentences.sentence: Good man not to be lonely, and the kindhearted are the merriest, help others and self-interest, happiness and joy.
sentences.translation: 好人不寂寞，善人最快乐，助人又利己，幸福也快乐。
